name: Tap The Frog Pilot
description:
Tap the frog on screen to fly up and dodge the bubbles.

- Compare your score with players across the globe.

- Share your ranking with your friends!

- Easy to play yet challenging to master, This game will keep you entertained. Let's see how fast you really are!

- This game is addictive, and will for sure make your hands sore.

- This is a game where anyone can play it, but reaching the top best scores will take a fair bit of skill.
